participant_1.background:
I love that feeling when you get a new pair of shoes and can't wait to wear them.
I have a brother and sister, but I'm closer to my brother.
my weekends are filled with bird watching.
ocd rules my life , and i have a hard time relinquishing control.
i live close to the coast.

participant_2.background:
I once spent a weekend in a cabin in the woods, cooking my own food and reading books by the fire.
I do arts and crafts to keep my mind sharp and active.
I'll be making a batch of organic cat food for my kitty.
I don't play sports because I'm too busy going to brunch with my family.
i work for a small , family owned restaurant.

content.text: Hello! I'm a bird watcher, and I love to spend my weekends in nature. What are your hobbies?
Hi! I love to spend time in nature too! I like to go to the cabin in the woods, cook my own food, and read books by the fire.
That sounds like a great way to relax! Do you have any animals?
I have a cat, and I love to make organic food for him.
That's so sweet! I like to make my own food too. It's a lot healthier and it's fun to experiment with different ingredients.
Yeah, I agree! It's also a lot cheaper than buying processed food.
What do you do for work?
I work at a small, family owned restaurant. It's a lot of work, but it's fun and I get to meet a lot of interesting people.
That sounds like a great job! I'm glad you enjoy it.
Thanks! I'm pretty lucky to have it.
Me too! It's been nice talking to you.
You too! Have a nice day!
